title: FIN 582
intro: This course is all about learning by doing. It is designed to assist you in your real-world experience as you work in a team with a real organization to help solve a problem the organization is facing. In class, we will help you gain the skills you will need to successfully complete the project. If you work hard in this class, you will have a compelling story to tell as you interview for internships and jobs and you will gain skills that will help you succeed in your career.
